title: ISic000507. I.Sicily inscription 000507
body:
Facsimile Images

Imp(eratori) ((·)) Caesari ⟦Domitiano⟧
Aug(usto) ((·)) Germanico
pont(ifici) ((·)) max(imo) ((·)) trib(unicia) ((·)) pot(estate) ((·)) III
Imp(eratori) ((·)) VII ((·)) co(n)s(uli) ((·)) X ((·)) p(atri) ((·)) p(atriae)
5opus ((·)) aquae ((·)) ductus ((·)) exstructum
supra ((·)) terram ((·)) et ((·)) lapidibus
quadratis ((·)) a ((·)) novo ((·)) tectum

Apparatus criticus

Text: CIL

English translation

To Imperator Caesar Domitianus Augustus Germanicus, pontifex maximus, with tribunician power for the third time, imperator for the 7th time, consul for the 10th time, father of the fatherland. The work of an aqueduct was constructed above ground and newly covered with squared stones ...

commentary

bibliography
